sn56.15:1.1: “Dhāretha no tumhe, bhikkhave, mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti?
sn56.15:1.2: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
sn56.15:1.3: “ahaṁ kho, bhante, dhāremi bhagavatā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti.
sn56.15:1.4: “Yathā kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, dhāresi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti?
sn56.15:1.5: “Dukkhaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi;
sn56.15:1.6: dukkhasamudayaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā dutiyaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi;
sn56.15:1.7: dukkhanirodhaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā tatiyaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi;
sn56.15:1.8: dukkhanirodhagāminiṁ paṭipadaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavatā catutthaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ dhāremi.
sn56.15:1.9: Evaṁ khvāhaṁ, bhante, dhāremi bhagavatā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti.
sn56.15:2.2: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, dhāresi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānīti.
sn56.15:2.3: Dukkhaṁ kho, bhikkhu, mayā paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ, tathā naṁ dhārehi;
sn56.15:2.4: dukkhasamudayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, mayā dutiyaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ, tathā naṁ dhārehi;
sn56.15:2.5: dukkhanirodhaṁ kho, bhikkhu, mayā tatiyaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ, tathā naṁ dhārehi;
sn56.15:2.6: dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā kho, bhikkhu, mayā catutthaṁ ariyasaccaṁ desitaṁ, tathā naṁ dhārehi.
sn56.15:2.7: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, dhārehi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānīti.
sn56.15:3.1: Tasmātiha, bhikkhu, ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yogo karaṇīyo …pe… ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yogo karaṇīyo”ti.
